title: Download Problem Help pls
body:
i am really tired of trying to download the Game 
it stop between 28 - 30% for more than 5 hours 
i tried allllll  
if anyone can help  or if there is any link of the full uploaded game without client 
i even tried Garena but i have 200 ping and i cant change region to Eu ....

replies.body: If you're getting stuck around the 30% mark it could be happening from not having the right permissions settings in place. Double check your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) really quick with that guide and let me know if that helps or not.
